snippet.title: Gas Girl playthrough (Net Yaroze)
snippet.description:
Homebrew game developed by Koji Yoshikawa [ 吉川 康治 ] in 1998 using the Playstation Net Yaroze development kit [ ネットやろうぜ ]. This was his contribution for the Dengeki Playstation homebrew contest that same year. He would have liked to include a more complex opening and ending, but his son was born twenty days before the contest closing date and he couldn't spend more time programming.

It's really well done for a homebrew game, it reminds me of Magic Pockets but in 3D.  As you can see, handling the blue gas can be a real pain in the ass.
